TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you are forced to be nocturnal for the rest of your life, because you will melt in sunlight.

I wish space flight was cheaper.

Edited March 19, 2015 by Rthsom

granted. space flight is cheaper,but the engines fail alot,crashing every single launch down into the earth. and the earth explodes.

I wish i was doctor who.

Granted you are now the most lonely person who NEVER has friends that last even the tardis dies have fun

i wish for a paradox

your wish is granted by you not getting a paradox. Which means it isn't granted. (It think that works? paradoxes are hard.)

I wish for the color blue.

Granted. Everything is blue now.

I wish to be able to live without sleep (without ill effects on my body and mind).

granted. You die in a freak accident one hour after said wish is granted.

I wish to be one of the richest people on the planet (there's no way this can go wrong, right? )

You get to be an accountant for one of the richest people in the world. You handle that person's money, making you technically one of the richest people in the world , but you can't spend it on yourself. And that person is a horrible boss and pay you pittance.

I wish to have a storyline in KSP. Hopefully continued the aborted one.

Granted. It's a romantic story line (and it's not a better love story than Twilight).

I wish I could shape-shift into whatever I want.

Granted but you can only do it once choose carefully (be a butterfly )

i wish wish for a telephone pole

granted. its in the form of an SA-2 SAM launched directly at your face.

i wish for a regular telephone pole not falling on me or anything. just a regular telephone pole. no explosions

That's what you get a boring old telephone pole

i wish I could be just a little smarter?

Granted. +0.1 IQ.

I wish to be immune to all illnesses and injuries.

Granted you at 21 from old age

i wish my mods worked better (still testing them out)

Granted, they will be broken with the next version.

I wish for rockÃ‚Â´nÃ‚Â´roll and metal to be popular again.

Granted. The surge of popularity draws in all the terrible composers that just want to milk the mainstream, and because majority of the population likes their "music", your favourite musicians are pushed out of the market and disbanded.

I wish for more hard drive space.

Granted you crash your car (think about it)

i wish fo a golden ram

Granted. You have created matter, therefore broke the universe.

I wish to NOT break the universe.

Granted. The universe breaks you.

I wish for a joystick to play KSP with.

Granted, KSP doesn't support that model

I wish for gametime in EVE Onine

Granted, but your account got banned.

I wish for the Place-Anywhere 7 Linear RCS Port to be actually placeable anywhere.

Granted. Place it on YOU.

I wish my quarter would come back. I had it disappear and now I can't find it.

Ganged your a quarter richer but your arrested for theif of the quarter

I wish for LSD

Granted. Drugs kill people. You are now dead.

I wish for an actual gaming PC

Granted. You get a Gaming Princess Celestia. Get the bag of ice.

At least I WISH I had a bag of ice. I was not ready for a sudden heat wave.

Granted, but the bag is thermal-resistant and you can't open it. You didn't wish for the keys!

I wish I was a multifrooglepoopillionaire.

Edited March 20, 2015 by Overfloater
